title: Post Malone - Only Wanna Be With You (Pokémon 25 Version)
author: PostMaloneVEVO
description:
Only Wanna Be With You – Pokémon 25 Version by Post Malone, from the virtual concert celebrating 25 years of Pokémon. Get the song here: https://postmalone.lnk.to/OWBWY

Pre-save Pokémon 25: The Album here: https://bit.ly/37Obb8O

►Follow Post Malone online: https://www.postmalone.com https://instagram.com/postmalone https://twitter.com/postmalone https://facebook.com/postmalone https://tiktok.com/@postmalone https://snapchat.com/add/postmalone

►Follow Pokémon online: www.pokemon.com.25 https://facebook.com/Pokemon https://twitter.com/Pokemon https://instagram.com/pokemon https://youtube.com/user/pokemon
